item.title: Software packages
item.description: RITHMS: An advanced stochastic framework for the simulation of transgenerational hologenomic data ğŸ”— betaHMM: A hidden Markov model to identify differential methylation sites and regions from beta-valued methylation data ğŸ”— betaclust: A Family of Beta Mixture Models for Clustering Beta-Valued DNA Methylation Data ğŸ”— BayesRCO: Bayesian genomic prediction models for overlapping annotations ğŸ”— rpl: Randomized pairwise likelihood method for complex statistical inferences ğŸ”— padma: Pathway deviation scores using multiple factor analysis ğŸ”— maskmeans: Multi-view aggregation/splitting K-means clustering algorithm ğŸ”— coseq: Co-expression analysis of sequencing data ğŸ”— ICAL: Model selection for model based clustering of annotated data ğŸ”— metaRNASeq: Meta-analysis of RNA-seq data ğŸ”— HTSDiff: Differential analysis for RNA-seq data ğŸ”— HTSFilter: Filter for replicated high-throughput sequencing data ğŸ”— HTSCluster: Clustering high-throughput sequencing data with Poisson mixture models ğŸ”— ebdbNet: Empirical Bayes estimation for dynamic Bayesian networks ğŸ”—

item.title: Shiny apps
item.description: Invest Astuces: An R/Shiny interactive web application for financial and real estate loan simulations ğŸŒ Regeneration Rosetta: An R/Shiny interactive web application to explore regeneration-associated gene expression and chromatin accessibility ğŸŒ Edge in TCGA: An R/Shiny interactive web application for the exploration of drivers of gene expression in The Cancer Genome Atlas ğŸŒ
